channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ElevenLabs、映画、ポッドキャスト、インタビューのポストプロダクション用に音声ファイルから背景ノイズを除去する無料のAIツール「Voice Isolator」を発表（Shubham Sharma/VentureBeat）
item.description:
Shubham Sharma / VentureBeat:
ElevenLabs launches Voice Isolator, a free AI tool for removing background noise from audio files for film, podcast, and interview post production  —  ElevenLabs, the AI voice startup known for its voice cloning, text-to-speech and speech-to-speech models, has just added another tool to its product portfolio: an AI Voice Isolator.

item.title: ABCニュースの1対1のインタビューで、バイデン大統領は、約1ヶ月間、彼の年齢がメディアに大きく取り上げられた後、彼のフィットネスに関する質問に反撃した（Alexandra Hutzler/ABC News）。
item.description:
Alexandra Hutzler / ABC News:
In an ABC News one-on-one interview, President Biden pushed back against questions about his fitness, after about a month of heavy media focus on his age  —  : Speaking with George Stephanopoulos, he dismissed concerns about mental fitness.  —  President Joe Biden speaks with George Stephanopoulos …

item.title: 2023年8月、カンザス州紙への警察の家宅捜索をめぐる訴訟の一部を和解するため、23万5000ドルを受け取ることに同意した元マリオン郡記録紙記者デブ・グルーバー（John Hanna/Associated Press）
item.description:
John Hanna / Associated Press:
Former Marion County Record reporter Deb Gruver agrees to accept $235,000 to settle part of her lawsuit over a police raid on the Kansas paper in August 2023  —  A former reporter for a weekly Kansas newspaper has agreed to accept $235,000 to settle part of her federal lawsuit over a police raid …

item.title: ハリウッドのメディア大手は、半年時点でディズニーとフォックスを除いて2桁の株価下落となっており、2024年も水面下で推移する可能性が高い（Cynthia Littleton/Variety）
item.description:
Cynthia Littleton / Variety:
At the half-year mark, Hollywood media giants have had double-digit stock price declines, except Disney and Fox, and will likely stay underwater in 2024  —  Disney and Fox Corp. buck the downtrend for showbiz shares at the midyear mark  —  As always, the numbers tell the tale.

item.title: ドイツ政府は、早ければ2025年1月から30％の映画／TV制作税制優遇措置を追加することを公約、オーストラリアは7月1日にリベートを30％に引き上げ（Scott Roxborough/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Scott Roxborough / The Hollywood Reporter:
Germany's government pledges to add a 30% film/TV production tax incentive, effective as early as January 2025; Australia raised its rebate to 30% on July 1  —  German studios have been pushing for the incentive, which they say is necessary to remain competitive in attracting international productions.

item.title: テキストに重点を置き、ユーザーにとって明確な目的がないため、Threadsにインフルエンサーを集めるのに苦労しているMetaの様子（Taylor Lorenz/Washington Post）
item.description:
Taylor Lorenz / Washington Post:
A look at Meta's struggles to attract influencers to Threads, due to the platform's focus on text and its lack of a clear purpose for users  —  Threads launched a year ago Friday but has a fraction of the users of Meta's other platforms.  Content creators say they don't consider it important.

item.title: ポーランド国営放送がドナルド・トゥスク首相が "誤解を招く "非難をしたとする記事を削除、トゥスク首相は放送局を脱政治化していないとの主張を裏付ける（Daniel Tilles/Notes From Poland）
item.description:
Daniel Tilles / Notes From Poland:
Polish state broadcaster deletes an article that said PM Donald Tusk made “misleading” accusations, supporting claims that Tusk hasn't depoliticized the outlet  —  Poland's state broadcaster, TVP, has deleted an article from its website that found Prime Minister Donald Tusk to have made …

item.title: YouTube、クリエイター向け「Erase Song」ツールを更新、AIアルゴリズムで著作権保護された音楽を検出し、他の音声に影響を与えずに動画から削除（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
YouTube updates its Erase Song tool for creators with an AI algorithm to detect and remove any copyrighted music from their videos without impacting other audio  —  On July 4, YouTube released an updated eraser tool for creators so they can easily remove any copyrighted music …

item.title: サッカーメディア『フットボルコ』の北米CEOジェイソン・ワゲンハイムに、編集スタッフの拡大、ライフスタイル・ブランドから学ぶことなどについてインタビュー（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An interview with soccer media company Footballco's North America CEO Jason Wagenheim on expanding its editorial staff, learning from lifestyle brands, and more  —  Footballco's first CEO for North America is enjoying the “luxury” of setting up a “really big, massive important business” …

item.title: Cloudflare、ボットによるAI学習用ウェブサイトのスクレイピングをブロックするツールを発表、全顧客に無料で提供（Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Kyle Wiggers / TechCrunch:
Cloudflare launches a tool that aims to block bots from scraping websites for AI training data, available free for all its customers  —  Cloudflare, the publicly traded cloud service provider, has launched a new, free tool to prevent bots from scraping websites hosted on its platform for data to train AI models.

item.title: オーストラリア、国内で撮影されるテレビ・映画作品に対するロケ地オフセット減税を従来の16.5％から30％に引き上げ（Jesse Whittock/Deadline）
item.description:
Jesse Whittock / Deadline:
Australia raises its Location Offset tax rebate for TV and film productions shooting in the country from the previous 16.5% to 30%  —  The Australian screen industry is celebrating after the country's Location Offset scheme was raised to 30%.  —  The legislation, which was announced in May …

item.title: ある専門家によれば、英国の政党は選挙当日のオンライン広告に、メタに100万ポンド、グーグルに25万ポンドを費やす勢いだという。
item.description:
Jim Waterson / The Guardian:
One expert says UK political parties were on track to spend £1M on Meta and £250K on Google for election day online ads, as Ofcom rules only limit broadcast ads  —  Digital campaigning gets round media blackout rule restricting broadcasters' coverage while polls are open

item.title: ポーランドのメディアは、メディアとハイテク企業がコンテンツの補償について合意できなかった場合、国の調停を保証する修正案が否決されたことに抗議している（Alicja Ptak/Notes From Poland）。
item.description:
Alicja Ptak / Notes From Poland:
Polish media protests lawmakers' rejection of an amendment guaranteeing state mediation if an outlet and tech firm fail to agree on compensation for content  —  Over 350 Polish media outlets, including many of the country's biggest titles, are jointly protesting today against changes …

item.title: ネットフリックス、ディズニー、その他の米ストリーミング配信会社、ローカルニュースやその他のコンテンツの財源を確保するため、売上の5%の手数料賦課を阻止するようカナダの裁判所に要請（Paul Vieira/Dow Jones Newswires）
item.description:
Paul Vieira / Dow Jones Newswires:
Netflix, Disney, and other US streaming companies ask a Canadian court to block imposition of a fee of 5% of sales to help finance local news and other content  —  OTTAWA—Netflix, Walt Disney and other U.S. streaming companies have asked a Canadian court to stop plans by authorities to force …

item.title: データ：Google検索の58.5%（米国）、59.7%（EU）はクリックされない。1,000回の検索に対して、米国では360回、EUでは374回クリックされ、オープンウェブに移動する（Rand Fishkin/SparkToro
item.description:
Rand Fishkin / SparkToro:
Datos: 58.5% of Google searches in the US and 59.7% in the EU result in no clicks; for 1,000 searches, 360 clicks go to the open web in the US and 374 in the EU  —  Over the past decade, I've done several reports with multiple clickstream panels analyzing Google search behavior at scale.
